original_text: Then he gave the commanders of units of a hundred the spears and the large and small shields that had belonged to King David and that were in the temple of God.
korean_text: 제사장 여호야다가 하나님의 전 안에 있는 다윗 왕의 창과 큰 방패와 작은 방패를 백부장들에게 주고

sentences.original_text: Then he gave the commanders of units of a hundred
the spears and the large and small shields
that had belonged to King David
and that were in the temple of God
